description: The DST Causality actor is the process identified by the operation system on the remote host as the process that performed an action that was responsible for the entire chain of execution.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_causality_id
fields.description: Causality chain identifier.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_effective_user_sid
fields.description: Win: Primary user token of the executed binary. Unix: Effective UID of the executed binary.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_effective_username
fields.description: Source effective username.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_primary_user_sid
fields.description: Win: Primary user token of the executed binary. Unix: Effective UID of the executed binary.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_primary_username
fields.description: Name assigned to the user_sid.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_process_auth_id
fields.description: Windows: LUID (uint64) representing the token of the process.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_process_causality_id
fields.description: Process causality chain identifier

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_process_command_line
fields.description: Process command line - The command used to execute the process.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_process_command_line_indices
fields.description: Process command line - The command used to execute the process.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_process_device_info
fields.description: Info about the device (volume + HW) from which this process started. including name, class guid, class name, bus type, volume guid, mount point, file system, drive type, vendor id, product id, and serial number.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_process_execution_time
fields.description: Process execution time.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_process_file_access_time
fields.description: Access time of the file that created the process.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_process_file_create_time
fields.description: Creation time of the file that created the process.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_process_file_mod_time
fields.description: Modification time of the file that created the process.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_process_file_size
fields.description: Size of the file involved in the process in bytes.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_process_image_extension
fields.description: Process image extension - File extension.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_process_image_md5
fields.description: MD5 of the binary.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_process_image_name
fields.description: Process image name.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_process_image_path
fields.description: Process image path - A string identifying the location of the execution.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_process_image_sha256
fields.description: SHA256 of the binary.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_process_instance_id
fields.description: Process instance identifier.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_process_integrity_level
fields.description: Process integrity level.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_process_is_64bit
fields.description: Indicates whether or not the process is 64-bit.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_process_is_native
fields.description: Indicates whether or not this process is a 'native process'. On a 32-bit machine, the value is always true, and on 64-bit machine, the value is true, if the process is 64-bit.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_process_is_replay
fields.description: Indicates whether or not the agent is alive during the execution of the process.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_process_is_special
fields.description: Indicates special system processes: RegularProcess = 0, KernelProcess = 1, AppContainerProcess = 2, NonWin32SubsystemProcess = 3

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_process_logon_id
fields.description: Windows: LUID (uint64) representing the token of the process.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_process_os_pid
fields.description: The Operating System (OS) Process Identifier (PID) of the destination causality actor process

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_process_session_id
fields.description: Windows: Session ID of the process.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_process_signature_is_embedded
fields.description: Indicates whether or not the signature is embedded inside the Program Executable (PE) or part of an external catalog file.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_process_signature_product
fields.description: Signature product - The product family part of the signature.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_process_signature_status
fields.description: Process Signature Status: Signed = 1, SignedInvalid = 2, Unsigned = 3, FailedToObtain = 4, WeakHash = 5, Unsupported = 6, InvalidCVE2020_0601 = 7, Deleted = 8

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_process_signature_vendor
fields.description: Signature vendor - The vendor part of the signature.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_remote_host
fields.description: Relevant when the actor is a remote actor and the host was resolved successfully.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_remote_ip
fields.description: Relevant when the actor is a remote actor, where the type is not local and the IP was resolved successfully.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_remote_pipe_name
fields.description: Relevant when the actor is a remote actor, where the type is RemoteRpcNamedPipe.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_remote_port
fields.description: Relevant when the actor is a remote actor, where the type is RemoteRpcTcp.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_type
fields.description: Type of Causality Actor: Local = 1, RemoteRpcNamedPipe = 2, RemoteRpcHttp = 3, RemoteRpcTcp = 4, RemoteFileSmb = 5

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_container_info
fields.description: Container information for the process.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_rpc_interface_uuid
fields.description: MS-RPC interface unique identifier.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_rpc_func_opnum
fields.description: MS-RPC function operation identitifer.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_rpc_interface_version_major
fields.description: MS-RPC interface major version.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_rpc_interface_version_minor
fields.description: MS-RPC interface minor version.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_rpc_protocol
fields.description: MS-RPC protocol type.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_process_last_writer_actor
fields.description: Cortex instance ID of the last process that has written the causality actor process image.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_process_image_auth_sha1
fields.description: Process image SHA-2 authenticode.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_process_image_auth_sha2
fields.description: Process image SHA-1 authenticode.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_process_file_original_name
fields.description: Original file name of the casuality actor image based on the file information metadata.

fields.name: dst_causality_actor_process_file_internal_name
fields.description: Internal name of the casuality actor image based on the file information metadata.
